mapper.select: SELECT u.CompanyID,d.ID, s.SettlementID,c.CompanyName, d.OrderTime,d.Status, d.OrderID,d.UserID FROM Orders d LEFT JOIN Users u on d.UserID = u.ID LEFT JOIN Companys c on u.CompanyID = c.ID LEFT JOIN CompanyBankAccount cb on c.ID = cb.CompanyID LEFT JOIN Settlement s on cb.ID = s.BankAccountID WHERE s.SettleType=2 order by s.SettleTime desc limit #{begin},#{pageNum}

SELECT u.CompanyID,d.ID, s.SettlementID,c.CompanyName, d.OrderTime,d.Status, d.OrderID,d.UserID FROM Orders d LEFT JOIN Users u on d.UserID = u.ID LEFT JOIN Companys c on u.CompanyID = c.ID LEFT JOIN CompanyBankAccount cb on c.ID = cb.CompanyID LEFT JOIN Settlement s on cb.ID = s.BankAccountID WHERE s.SettleType=1 order by s.SettleTime desc limit #{begin},#{pageNum}

select CONCAT('JS',DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d'),RIGHT(CONCAT('00000',(select count(id) from Settlement where 0=DATEDIFF(SettleTime,NOW()))+1),6))
insert into Settlement (settlementId, Currency, SettleAmount, SettleFee, SettleBy, SettleTime, Status, bankAccount, SettleType, IsInvoice,companyId ) values( #{settlementId}, #{currency}, #{settleAmount}, #{settleFee}, #{settleBy}, NOW(), 0, #{bankAccount}, #{settleType}, #{isInvoice}, #{companyId} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(d.id) from (Settlement s LEFT JOIN CompanyBankAccount cb on cb.ID = s.BankAccountID LEFT JOIN Companys c on c.ID = cb.CompanyID LEFT JOIN Users u on u.CompanyID = c.ID LEFT JOIN Orders d on d.UserID = u.ID) WHERE s.SettleType=1

SELECT count(d.id) from (Settlement s LEFT JOIN CompanyBankAccount cb on cb.ID = s.BankAccountID LEFT JOIN Companys c on c.ID = cb.CompanyID LEFT JOIN Users u on u.CompanyID = c.ID LEFT JOIN Orders d on d.UserID = u.ID) WHERE s.SettleType=2
mapper.update: update Settlement set status = 1 where settlementId=#{settlementId}
mapper.select: SELECT s.SettleTime,s.SettleAmount,s.SettleBy,n.InvoiceID,cb.BankAccount from Settlement s LEFT JOIN Invoice n ON n.SettlementID = s.SettlementID RIGHT JOIN CompanyBankAccount cb ON cb.ID = s.BankAccountID WHERE n.CompanyID = #{companyId} and s.status = 2

SELECT s.SettleTime,s.SettleAmount,s.SettleBy,n.InvoiceID,cb.BankAccount from Settlement s LEFT JOIN Invoice n ON n.SettlementID = s.SettlementID RIGHT JOIN CompanyBankAccount cb ON cb.ID = s.BankAccountID WHERE n.CompanyID = #{companyId} and s.status = 2 and s.SettleTime>#{sqlDateStart} and s.SettleTime<#{sqlDateEnd}
